meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a neume.
meanings.sent1: The neumatic symbols were used in the ancient music notation system.
meanings.sent2: The neumatic chant was beautiful and soothing.
meanings.sent3: The neumatic melody danced through the air like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a neumatic quality, rising and falling like musical notes.
meanings.sent5: The neumatic patterns in the score made the music come alive.

meanings.sent1: The choir director explained the meaning of each neumatic symbol.
meanings.sent2: The neumatic indicated the pitch and rhythm of the chant.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student drew neumes all over his music sheet.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed like a neumatic in the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The neumes on the page seemed to dance as the choir sang.
